snippet: With the holidays approaching, Warren E. Buffett’s company, Berkshire Hathaway, is stocking up on elf hats and reindeer paper plates by buying an 80-year-old retailer overflowing with them.
abstract: With the holidays approaching, Warren E. Buffett’s company, Berkshire Hathaway, is stocking up on elf hats and reindeer paper plates by buying an 80-year-old retailer overflowing with them.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Berkshire to Buy Oriental Trading Company
headline.print_headline: Berkshire to Buy Retailer Of Arts and Crafts Wares
